explanation: Funds are required to procure Blackhawk 60M airframes and associated equipment using the proceeds from sales collected in the amount of $22.811 million. The replacement property is an improved version of the items sold as part of the Blackhawk Exchange and Sales Team (BEST) Program.
Funds are required to procure Blackhawk 60M airframes and associated equipment using the

Funds are available from the sale of sixty (60) obsolete Blackhawk helicopters via the [Blackhawk Exchange and Sales Team (BEST) Program. The transactions were conducted through General Service Administration (GSA), with the transactions occurring from October 2021 through August 2022, totaling $41.541 million.
